description: go.talks/pkg/present: correctly split links at line beginnings

messages.text:
Hello campoy (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.talks

LGTM modulo tiny comment.

https://codereview.appspot.com/6998043/diff/1/pkg/present/style.go
File pkg/present/style.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6998043/diff/1/pkg/present/style.go#newcode129
pkg/present/style.go:129: if i > newMark && isSpace != prevWasSpace {
s/newMark/mark

I know it's equivalent, but mark is clearer IMO

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=90aeb3fdd6ea&repo=talks ***

go.talks/pkg/present: correctly split links at line beginnings

R=campoy, campoy
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/6998043

https://codereview.appspot.com/6998043/diff/1/pkg/present/style.go

https://codereview.appspot.com/6998043/diff/1/pkg/present/style.go#newcode129
pkg/present/style.go:129: if i > newMark && isSpace != prevWasSpace {
On 2012/12/21 00:00:41, gocampoy wrote:
> s/newMark/mark
> 
> I know it's equivalent, but mark is clearer IMO

I'd already done it ;-)
